description:
Equipped with a YKK® AquaGuard® zipper and inner storm flap, this raincoat offers enhanced water resistance. It includes two chest pockets for convenient storage. The armpit vents with YKK® 2-way Aquaguard® zippers provide ventilation during physical activities while the drawcord adjustable hem and velcro cuffs allow for a personalized fit, sealing in warmth and keeping you comfortable.

Embrace the unpredictable outdoors with our must-have raincoat. Designed for outdoor enthusiasts, it offers reliable protection in ever-changing weather.
name: Hooke Misty Rain Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 2.5 layers of fabric made of 100% polyester that provides waterproofness of 15,000 mm
